name: gsummhm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c3, cgsu, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, ccom(c1, c2)), cfv(c1, co(c3, cgsu, c2))))

-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c5))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](c1 ∘ c2))=(c1 `(c3[gsum]c2)))

⊣ (Cntz ` c3)=(Cntz ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mnd)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c7)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c3[MndHom]c0))
⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c6 → c4))
⊣ (w0 → ran(c2)⊆((Cntz ` c3)` ran(c2)))
⊣ c5 =(0 ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c2[finSupp]c5)
